name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SMS OTP default for Turkcell login

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you're trying to login internal Turkcell pages, see SMS OTP option selected by default.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install this extension to see SMS option selected by default on Turkcell internal login pages.

Disclaimer: This software neither produced nor listed by Turkcell. It's an unofficial product.
